title: The Client Isntallation is 16 GB and cannot be paused.
body:
Basically title. Love the game but with a 16 GB installation that goes back to 0% when closed sucks bigtime. 
My internet is good, but can sometimes be unstable and i cant download it all in one go.

Do you goddamned jobs and fix this. Or if anyone can be so kind and give me a torrent i would greatly appreciate it. Thanks in advance.

replies.body: It may be that you have a really old version of League with some old R3D Logs! This could be the only thing I can think of that would give you that kind of download. So in this case, if it's not to taxing for you it may be best to run a [clean reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040)after deleting the client as whole. If it continues after that then reach back out to me for help.
Thank you for the reply i will try it out exactly as you said. Hope it helps.
